name: Ikusa Miko: Vestal Virgin
storyline: The player was a vengeful lone demon hunter, pursuing evil in the name of his slain family. During his travels realizing his power could no longer be culled, he gave his powers to a virtuous shrine maiden. He now works with his new partner to help empower what was once his magics to make her a hero. All while their relationship blossoms.
summary: Ikusa Miko: Vestal Virgin is a simulation game released by AliceSoft. The game tasks the player, who was a vengeful demon hunter, with the growth of a warrior shrine maiden girl, after she has inherited your demon slaying powers. The game hinges on the player’s ability to foster her schedule which seeks to build her physical and mental attributes.
